title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 5, pt. 339 - Access To Personal Information Under Personal Privacy Protection Law
content:

§ 339.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 339.2 - Privacy compliance officer; personal information procedures

§ 339.6 - Requests for records
§ 339.7 - Amendment of records
§ 339.8 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 5, pt. 339

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34; Public Officers Law, art. 6-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
